content: *boncuk* means bead in turkish pronounced bon-juk referring to bead-like puff stitches this cute little keychain will bring a colourful personal touch to your keys or bag using the small amounts of leftover uneek worsted attaching optional beads or charms to the end of the chain in the final step adds a personal touch to your boncuk keychain **materials ** about 8-10g leftovers of urth uneek worsted per keychain shown in 4004 4001 4017 4021 4007 **sizes ** one size **dimensions ** 10 25 /26 cm circumference not including the loop x 1 /2 5 cm height **hook ** us d-3/3 25 mm **gauge ** 5x 1 puff st + 1 chain = 4 /10 cm exact gauge is not crucial **notions ** tapestry needle optional beads or charms **skills ** a beginner-friendly easy level pattern the techniques involved are crocheting flat half_double_crochet puff stitches joining pieces with single_crochet stitches
